item.title: Build Update - Mar 27
item.description: Last week we completed all major features, and presented The Lobster at the Mechatronics Capstone Symposium.

item.title: Build Update - Mar 17
item.description: As the Mechatronics Capstone Symposium gets closer and closer, testing continues and more improvements are made.

item.title: Build Update - Mar 10
item.description: A few minor updates are made to the machine, testing continues, and we run into some issues with our demo.

item.title: Build Update - Mar 3
item.description: We continue to move towards demonstrating our machine (and have a few more hiccups along the way).

item.title: Build Update - Feb 24
item.description: As reading week passes and the demo date gets closer, we make more progess towards a functional machine.

item.title: Build Update - Feb 17
item.description: The long-awaited bearings arrive, our wiring gets slightly messier, and we run into our first problem while testing.

item.title: Build Update - Feb 10
item.description: What’s new for Week 5? The first milling head is mounted to the machine, we start to clean up our wire routing, and we take a look at dust collection.

item.title: Build Update - Feb 3
item.description: This week on The Lobster: The x- and y-axis movement systems are installed, the first milling/drilling head gets assembled, and we get a big steel box.

item.title: Build Update - Jan 27
item.description: We run into a minor purchasing hurdle, the first components get mounted to the frame, and the device moves off of our kitchen counter.

item.title: Build Update - Jan 20
item.description: The build continues: more mechanical systems get built and tested, and the electrical team gets moving.

item.title: Build Update - Jan 13
item.description: The term is underway, and so is our build! The frame gets built (on our kitchen counter) and the computer vision program is coming together.

item.title: New Term Update - Jan 9
item.description: With the new year comes our 4B term, which means it’s time to start building!

item.title: Please rescue me from this strange man
Pump-up the team morale and celebrate the excellence
item.description: Heading example Here is example of hedings. You can use this heading by following markdownify rules.
